Package tictactoe

Class TicTacToeGame

java.lang.Object
tictactoe.TicTacToeGame
public class TicTacToeGame extends Object
A class to store the states and behaviors of a TicTacToe game.

  • Method Details

    • makeMark

      public void makeMark(String location) throws TicTacToeException
      Makes a mark based off a string location
      Parameters:
      location - The location to be marked
      Throws:
      TicTacToeException - if the location is in the wrong format.
      See Also:
      • parseUserInput(java.lang.String)

    • makeOpponentMark

      public void makeOpponentMark()
      Uses an to generate a move location, and then makes the move.

    • threeInARow

      public boolean threeInARow(TicTacToeMark teamMark)
      Parameters:
      teamMark - The mark of the team whose 3-in-a-row state should be tested.
      Returns:
      Whether the specified team has 3 marks in a row on the board at this time.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Checks 3 conditions:
      1. Is the board filled up with marks?
      2. Does X have a "three-in-a-row"?
      3. Does O have a "three-in-a-row"?
      Returns:
      Whether any of the 3 conditions mentioned above are true
